typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as string,
		{ month} as string,
		carrier as string,
		carrier_name as string,
		airport as string,
		airport_name as string,
		arr_flights as string,
		arr_del15 as string,
		carrier_ct as string,
		{ weather_ct} as string,
		nas_ct as string,
		security_ct as string,
		late_aircraft_ct as string,
		arr_cancelled as string,
		arr_diverted as string,
		{ arr_delay} as string,
		{ carrier_delay} as string,
		weather_delay as string,
		nas_delay as string,
		security_delay as string,
		late_aircraft_delay as string,
		{_c21} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
Select1 derive(partitionbydate = year+ { month}) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{ month},
		carrier,
		carrier_name,
		airport,
		airport_name,
		arr_flights,
		arr_del15,
		carrier_ct,
		{ weather_ct},
		nas_ct,
		security_ct,
		late_aircraft_ct,
		arr_cancelled,
		arr_diverted,
		{ arr_delay},
		{ carrier_delay},
		weather_delay,
		nas_delay,
		security_delay,
		late_aircraft_delay
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partitionbydate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
